item.title: Access Your Linux Desktop Remotely
item.description: I was contemplating a project like a media server, torrent seedbox, or simply backup files via P2P(i. e. Resilio Sync) using a Raspberry Pi 4. Then I realized I have an 11-12 y/o desktop PC in my room that I can use for the project. Well, this PC will draw way more electricity than a Raspberry Pi would but I wanted to test it then Iâ€™ll consider building such a system.
